  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:uciteljska/111895</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:uciteljska/111895</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Karte črni Peter za utrjevanje snovi - človeško telo</string>
            <string language="en">human body - black Peter cards</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">menschlicher Körper - schwarze Peter Karten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">corps humain - cartes noires de Peter</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">corpo humano - cartões pretos de Peter</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">corpo umano - schedi nere di Peter</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ανθρώπινο σώμα - μαύρες κάρτες Peter</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">cuerpo humano - tarjetas negras de Peter</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Ta pripomoček (karte črni Peter) naj vam služi pri utrjevanju ali pri DOP. P. Če se vam zdijo vprašanja neprimerna jih lahko zamenjate z ustreznejšimi! List natisnete na samolepilno nalepko format A4 (dobite jo bolje založenih papirnicah) in jo prilepite na trši karton in karte izrežete.</string>
            <string language="en">Set of cards that can be used to play black Peter with words regarding the human body.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">karte</string>
            <string language="en">cards</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">črni peter</string>
            <string language="en">black peter</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">človeško telo</string>
            <string language="en">human body</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Set Karten, die benutzt werden können, um 
schwarzes Peter mit den Wörtern betreffend sind den menschlichen 
Körper zu spielen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ensemble de cartes qui peuvent être employées 
pour jouer Peter noir avec des mots concernant le corps humain.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Jogo dos cartões que podem ser usados jogar 
Peter preto com as palavras a respeito do corpo humano.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Insieme delle schedi che possono essere usate per
giocare Peter nero con le parole per quanto riguarda il corpo umano.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σύνολο καρτών που μπορεί να χρησιμοποιηθεί για να 
παίξει μαύρο Peter με τις λέξεις σχετικά με το ανθρώπινο 
σώμα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Conjunto de las tarjetas que se pueden utilizar 
para jugar Peter negro con palabras con respecto al cuerpo humano.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Karten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">schwarzes peter</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">menschlicher Körper</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">cartes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">peter noir</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">corps humain</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">cartões</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">peter preto</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">corpo humano</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">schedi</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">peter nero</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">corpo umano</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κάρτες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μαύρος Peter</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ανθρώπινο σώμα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">tarjetas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">peter negro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">cuerpo humano</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
